title: [Old Ta'Faendryl, West Woods]
description: The path fades away to nothing amongst a thick stand of oak and brambles.  Protected on all side by ground sweeping breezes, the forest floor is covered with a thick layer of leaves.  The cloyingly sweetish smell of rotting organic matter lingers in the air.

The path fades away to nothing amongst a thick stand of oak and brambles.  Constantly shaded from the drying effects of the sun, the ground around the trees is moist and covered with a thick layer of leaves.  The sweetish smell of rotting organic matter lingers in the air.
